title: Reading Lila- An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 22
description: This chapter is revealing a lot about some of the dynamics we see in the world today, and gives us a much clearer way to analyse them. The origins of these dynamics are earlier than we think.
